mapper.select: SELECT d.department_seq, CASE WHEN d.department_seq IS NOT NULL THEN d.department_name WHEN d.department_seq IS NULL THEN '공통' END AS department_name, t.template_seq, tem.template_task_round, ts.task_submit_seq, CASE WHEN t.task_type = 'GROUP' THEN tg.task_group_seq WHEN t.task_type = 'PERSONAL' THEN e.employee_seq END AS submitter_seq, CASE WHEN t.task_type = 'GROUP' THEN tg.task_group_num WHEN t.task_type = 'PERSONAL' THEN e.employee_name END AS submitter_name, ts.task_seq, t.task_content, SUM(te.task_score) AS task_total_score FROM task_eval te JOIN task_submit ts ON ts.task_submit_seq = te.task_submit_seq JOIN task t ON t.task_seq = ts.task_seq JOIN template tem ON tem.template_seq = t.template_seq LEFT JOIN employee e ON t.task_type = 'PERSONAL' AND e.employee_seq = ts.employee_seq LEFT JOIN department d ON t.department_seq IS NOT NULL AND d.department_seq = t.department_seq LEFT JOIN task_group tg ON t.task_type = 'GROUP' AND tg.task_seq = t.task_seq GROUP BY department_name, tem.template_task_round, submitter_seq, submitter_name
